Description: IAM user access key - from the terraform user
IAM user secret key - from the terraform user
IAM user ARN - from the terraform user
IAM role ARN - from the terraform user
AWS region to setup the resources
AWS external id used while setting up IAM user and IAM role
Globally unique bucket name for terraform state files - suggest something like <node_type>-<node_env>-<org_name>-backend-state eg: aais-dev-aais-backend-state
Globally unique bucket name for terraform input files - suggest something like <node_type>-<node_env>-<org_name>-inputs eg: aais-dev-aais-inputs
DynamoDB table to manage terraform state locking in AWS resources pipeline - suggest <node_type>-<node_env>-<org_name>-aws-resources
DynamoDB table to manage terraform state locking in Kubernetes resources pipeline - suggest <node_type>-<node_env>-<org_name>-k8s-resources
